Ref: CXP007/2022
Closing date: 20 January 2023

The successful incumbent will be tasked with securing the premises and personnel by staying on patrol, monitoring surveillance equipment, performing indoor and outdoor inspections, guarding entry points,  verifying visitors and reporting incidents

Location: Ballito, Dolphin Coast and Stanger, KwaDukuza

Main Duties include:

-Must perform security patrols of designated areas

-Must observe and report suspicious activities and persons

-Must have ability to operate radio or telephone equipment and/or console monitors

-Must have ability to interact cordially and communicate with the public

-Must monitor and control access at building entrances and exits

-Must investigate and prepare reports on accidents, incidents, and suspicious activities

Criteria:

-PSIRA registered – min Grade B certified

-Firearm competency for Handgun and Shotgun and/or Rifle

-Valid, unendorsed Drivers License

-Fluent in English

-Good Report writing and communication skills

-At least 3 years relevant work experience

-Disciplined, Dedicated, Trustworthy, Reliable

-Attention to Detail, Honest, Punctual, Respectful, Presentable
